title: Coronavirus: Hospital defends decision to allow Ross Kemp behind-the-scenes access to Covid-19 patients
description: 'We felt it was important to give a true account on the work being done,' say bosses
content:
A hospital has defended its decision to allow Ross Kemp behind the scenes access to Covid-19 patients for a documentary.
